# Problem 1

## Step 1
Load tidyverse 
``` {r eval = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Step 2
Create a random sample of size 10 from a uniform [0,5] distribution called "sample" 
``` {r} 
sample = runif(n = 10, min = 0, max = 5)
```
